title.narrative: Private Sector Utility Scale Solar Power Support Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to increase privately owned and operated solar electricity generation in Armenia. The proposed $26 million of SREP funding will be combined with $4 million of IBRD resources to provide loan guarantees for up to 6 green-field solar power plants. These sub-projects are expected to be financed, built, owned and operated by private developers selected following a two-phase international competitive bidding process. This is the first solar power auction program ever taking place in Armenia. Not only SREP support will contribute to the diversification of Armenia’s energy mix, currently dominated by gas and nuclear energy, it will also reduce investment barriers by piloting the deployment of the country’s first utility-scale solar PV plants and stimulating the mobilization of commercial financing. Ultimately, the project is expected to mobilize up to $124 million of additional resources and improve access to electricity services to 3 million people, including 1.62 million of women.
